price: Na waulize watu wa mji tulio kuwako, na msafara tulio kuja nao. Na hakika sisi tunasema kweli.
arabic: وَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةَ ٱلَّتِي كُنَّا فِيهَا وَٱلۡعِيرَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَقۡبَلۡنَا فِيهَاۖ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
footnotes: Na ikiwa wewe una shaka na haya tunayo kwambia mtume mtu akuletee ushahidi wa watu wa Misri. Na pia wewe mwenyewe waulize wasafiri wenzetu tulio rudi nao, ipate kudhihiri kuwa sisi hatuna lawama. Nasi tunakuhakikishia kuwa sisi ni wakweli katika haya tuyasemayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wasali al-qaryata allatī kunnā fīhā wal-ʿīra allatī aqbalnā fīhā wa-innā laṣādiqūna
